name: The Hourglass Incident
description:
Follow through the footsteps of the protagonist, Casey Michaels, an ace detective.

Will you find the dark truth or will it remain a bloody mystery?

Notes:

Yes, there was suppose to be music but for some reason Ren'Py wont play the audio, I've tried to fix this multiple times but it just wont work.

I will be expanding on Casey and others' stories in later games.
